db:abstract.db:para: A row of names for the days in a week.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: DayOfWeekRow presents day of week names in a row. The names of the days are ordered and formatted using the specified locale.
DayOfWeekRow can be used as a standalone control, but it is most often used in conjunction with MonthGrid. Regardless of the use case, positioning of the row is left to the user.
The visual appearance of DayOfWeekRow can be changed by implementing a custom delegate.

db:section.db:title: delegate : Component
db:section.db:para: This property holds the item delegate that visualizes each day of the week.
In addition to the index property, a list of model data roles are available in the context of each delegate:

db:td.db:para: The long version of the day name; for example, "Monday" (QLocale::LongFormat)
The short version of the day name; for example, "Mon" (QLocale::ShortFormat)
A special version of the day name for use when space is limited. For example, "M" (QLocale::NarrowFormat)

db:section.db:para: The following snippet presents the default implementation of the item delegate. It can be used as a starting point for implementing custom delegates.
db:section.db:programlisting:
delegate: Text { text: shortName font: control.font horizontalAlignment: Text.AlignHCenter verticalAlignment: Text.AlignVCenter
required property string shortName }
